sentences.english: Shamanism is one of the main subjects of the Ewenki traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教信仰是鄂温克族传统文化中的主要内容之一。

sentences.english: The article makes a tentative discussion on the folk literature of Ewenqi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 本文对鄂温克族民间文学进行了初步研究。

sentences.english: Shamanism is the traditional and ancient religious belief of Ewenki.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教是鄂温克族传统而古老的宗教信仰。
